item.description:
An Evening with Shel Israel in Twitterville

join SNCR Senior Fellow and author, Shel Israel, for an evening in Twitterville. Shel Israel’s new book, Twitterville, is rich with instructive anecdotes and case studies on how leading organizations are discovering how to use Twitter, real world tips and stories from Twitter users, and even a vision for how Twitter might enable world peace. Join us for an engaging evening of discussion about how one little technology is having a very big impact on business and society.


  • Reception: 5:00pm – 6:00pm
  • Presentation & Discussion: 6:00pm – 7:00pm
  • Book-signing: 7:00pm – 7:30pm


$25. suggested donation per person at the door
___

This event is being host by SNCR in conjunction with the 4th Annual SNCR Research Symposium.

Be the first to hear new research, strategies and best practices for the latest in social media and new communications from the Society for New Communications Research Fellows on the latest trends, strategies and best practices for social media, ICT, new media and communications initiatives.

See the full agenda and session descriptions and register for the Symposium at http://sncr.org/sympo...

Or call (408) 266-9658 or email sncroffice@gmail.com for more information & to register.

group.name: Society for New Communications Research Symposium Event

item.name: An Evening with Shel Israel in Twitterville & 4th Annual SNCR Research Symposium
